Input¶

class pyBrown.input.InputData(input_filename, obligatory_keywords=[], defaults={}, all_keywords=None)¶

Bases: object

This is a class parsing and storing input json file.

Parameters

input_data (class: dictionary) – keyword-value pairs loaded from the input JSON file

Constructor method

Parameters

  • input_filename (string) – the name of the input .json file with simulalion configuration

  • obligatory_keywords (class: list) – the list of obligatory keywords, defaults to []

  • defaults (class: dictionary) – the dictionary containg default keyword-value pairs, deaults to {}

pyBrown.input.read_str_file(input_str_filename)¶

Reads bead positions and parameters.

Parameters

input_str_filename (string) – the name of the input .str file with bead initial coordinates and parameters

Returns

list of bead objects

Return type

class: list of objects of class: Bead
